turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order three pizzas from a pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, knew quite frankly they only do the largest.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what toppings do you want on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are their specials at Bella What are the specials at Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they have the meatlovers special.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Meat lover's, yeah, okay. Let's get the meat lover's special. What meats are on that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is there sausage on it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: chicken, ham, bacon, sausage and linguica.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Yeah, that's that's going to meat lovers then.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's also get No, no. Just one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: on all 3?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's get one with mushroom and linguica and let's get the last one with.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No tomatoes, I'm sorry. With olives, black pepper.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hot sauce and.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you read that back to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: 3 large pizzas. one meatlovers, the second with mushrooms and linguiça and the third with olives, black pepper, hot sauce and pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. your total is $53.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need all of that on gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, adding gluten free crust to your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. And is there hot sauce, the Diablo sauce?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, is that the kind of hot sauce you would like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! i will add that to the order as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bela luna's in 45 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy, bye!
